choose.when:
insert into mba_fin_analysis_index ( is_deleted,code,code_name,roa,tot_ope_rev, ope_rev,goodwill,roe_avg,segment_sales,r_and_d_costs, debt_to_assets,roe_basic,net_profit_margin,gross_profit_margin,cash_to_current_debt, eps_basic,bps,or_ps,pb,gr_ps,cf_ps,pe,update_time,create_time) VALUES
(0, #{otherIndexDO.code}, #{otherIndexDO.codeName}, #{otherIndexDO.roa}, #{otherIndexDO.totOpeRev}, #{otherIndexDO.opeRev}, #{otherIndexDO.goodwill}, #{otherIndexDO.roeAvg}, #{otherIndexDO.segmentSales}, #{otherIndexDO.rAndDCosts}, #{otherIndexDO.debtToAssets}, #{otherIndexDO.roeBasic}, #{otherIndexDO.netProfitMargin}, #{otherIndexDO.grossProfitMargin}, #{otherIndexDO.cashToCurrentDebt}, #{otherIndexDO.epsBasic}, #{otherIndexDO.bps}, #{otherIndexDO.orPs}, #{otherIndexDO.pb}, #{otherIndexDO.grPs}, #{otherIndexDO.cfPs}, #{otherIndexDO.pe}, now(), now())
on duplicate key update is_deleted = 0,code=values(code),code_name=values(code_name),roa=values(roa), tot_ope_rev=values(tot_ope_rev),ope_rev=values(ope_rev),goodwill=values(goodwill), roe_avg=values(roe_avg),segment_sales=values(segment_sales),r_and_d_costs=values(r_and_d_costs), debt_to_assets=values(debt_to_assets),roe_basic=values(roe_basic), net_profit_margin=values(net_profit_margin),gross_profit_margin=values(gross_profit_margin), cash_to_current_debt=values(cash_to_current_debt),eps_basic=values(eps_basic),bps=values(bps), or_ps=values(or_ps),pb=values(pb),gr_ps=values(gr_ps),cf_ps=values(cf_ps),pe=values(pe), update_time=now()

insert into mba_growth_index ( is_deleted,code,code_name,growth_gr,yoy_tr, yoy_assets_tb,yoy_ebt,yoy_debt,growth_or,yoy_profit, fa_yoy,yoy_assets_hb,qfa_cgr_sales,qfa_cgr_profit,yoy_eps_basic, yoy_or,yoy_equity,yoy_bps,yoy_op,growth_gc, growth_op,qfa_cgr_op,create_time,update_time) VALUES
(0, #{otherIndexDO.code}, #{otherIndexDO.codeName}, #{otherIndexDO.growthGr}, #{otherIndexDO.yoyTr}, #{otherIndexDO.yoyAssetsTb}, #{otherIndexDO.yoyEbt}, #{otherIndexDO.yoyDebt}, #{otherIndexDO.growthOr}, #{otherIndexDO.yoyProfit}, #{otherIndexDO.faYoy}, #{otherIndexDO.yoyAssetsHb}, #{otherIndexDO.qfaCgrSales}, #{otherIndexDO.qfaCgrProfit}, #{otherIndexDO.yoyEpsBasic}, #{otherIndexDO.yoyOr}, #{otherIndexDO.yoyEquity}, #{otherIndexDO.yoyBps}, #{otherIndexDO.yoyOp}, #{otherIndexDO.growthGc}, #{otherIndexDO.growthOp}, #{otherIndexDO.qfaCgrOp}, now(), now())
on duplicate key update is_deleted = 0,code=values(code),code_name=values(code_name),growth_gr=values(growth_gr), yoy_tr=values(yoy_tr),yoy_assets_tb=values(yoy_assets_tb),yoy_ebt=values(yoy_ebt), yoy_debt=values(yoy_debt),growth_or=values(growth_or),yoy_profit=values(yoy_profit), fa_yoy=values(fa_yoy),yoy_assets_hb=values(yoy_assets_hb),qfa_cgr_sales=values(qfa_cgr_sales), qfa_cgr_profit=values(qfa_cgr_profit),yoy_eps_basic=values(yoy_eps_basic),yoy_or=values(yoy_or), yoy_equity=values(yoy_equity),yoy_bps=values(yoy_bps),yoy_op=values(yoy_op),growth_gc=values(growth_gc), growth_op=values(growth_op),qfa_cgr_op=values(qfa_cgr_op),update_time=now()

insert into mba_dupont_analysis_index ( is_deleted,code,code_name,profit_to_gr,roe, assets_turn,dupont_np,ebi_to_gr,dupont_int_burden,dupont_tax_burden, update_time,create_time) VALUES
(0,#{otherIndexDO.code}, #{otherIndexDO.codeName}, #{otherIndexDO.profitToGr}, #{otherIndexDO.roe}, #{otherIndexDO.assetsTurn}, #{otherIndexDO.dupontNp}, #{otherIndexDO.ebiToGr}, #{otherIndexDO.dupontIntBurden}, #{otherIndexDO.dupontTaxBurden}, now(), now())
on duplicate key update is_deleted = 0, code=values(code),code_name=values(code_name),profit_to_gr=values(profit_to_gr), roe=values(roe),assets_turn=values(assets_turn),dupont_np=values(dupont_np),ebi_to_gr=values(ebi_to_gr), dupont_int_burden=values(dupont_int_burden),dupont_tax_burden=values(dupont_tax_burden), update_time=now()

insert into mba_stock_value ( is_deleted,code,code_name,pb_mrq,eps_ttm, mkt_free_shares,gr_ttm,profit_ttm,pb_lyr,or_ps_ttm, mkt_cap_float,ev,or_ttm,create_time,update_time) VALUES
(0,#{otherIndexDO.code}, #{otherIndexDO.codeName}, #{otherIndexDO.pbMrq}, #{otherIndexDO.epsTtm}, #{otherIndexDO.mktFreeShares}, #{otherIndexDO.grTtm}, #{otherIndexDO.profitTtm}, #{otherIndexDO.pbLyr}, #{otherIndexDO.orPsTtm}, #{otherIndexDO.mktCapFloat}, #{otherIndexDO.ev}, #{otherIndexDO.orTtm}, now(), now())
on duplicate key update is_deleted = 0,code=values(code),code_name=values(code_name),pb_mrq=values(pb_mrq), eps_ttm=values(eps_ttm),mkt_free_shares=values(mkt_free_shares),gr_ttm=values(gr_ttm), profit_ttm=values(profit_ttm),pb_lyr=values(pb_lyr),or_ps_ttm=values(or_ps_ttm), mkt_cap_float=values(mkt_cap_float),ev=values(ev),or_ttm=values(or_ttm),update_time=now()

insert into mba_tec_analysis_index ( is_deleted,code,code_name,tech_bias5,bull_bear_ma, breakout_ma,buying,LON,breakdown_ma,update_time,create_time) VALUES
(0,#{otherIndexDO.code}, #{otherIndexDO.codeName}, #{otherIndexDO.techBias5}, #{otherIndexDO.bullBearMa}, #{otherIndexDO.breakoutMa}, #{otherIndexDO.buying}, #{otherIndexDO.lON}, #{otherIndexDO.breakdownMa}, now(), now())
on duplicate key update is_deleted = 0,code=values(code),code_name=values(code_name),tech_bias5=values(tech_bias5), bull_bear_ma=values(bull_bear_ma),breakout_ma=values(breakout_ma),buying=values(buying), lON=values(lON),breakdown_ma=values(breakdown_ma),update_time=now()

insert into mba_industry_class ( is_deleted,code,code_name,industry_sw,industry_cit, industry_cit_code,industry_sw_code,update_time,create_time) VALUES
(0,#{otherIndexDO.code}, #{otherIndexDO.codeName}, #{otherIndexDO.industrySw}, #{otherIndexDO.industryCit}, #{otherIndexDO.industryCitCode}, #{otherIndexDO.industrySwCode}, now(), now())
on duplicate key update is_deleted = 0,code=values(code),code_name=values(code_name),industry_sw=values(industry_sw), industry_cit=values(industry_cit),industry_cit_code=values(industry_cit_code), industry_sw_code=values(industry_sw_code),update_time=now()

insert into mba_sec_basic_index ( is_deleted,code,code_name,rt_mkt_cap,total_shares, rt_float_mkt_cap,share_issuing_mkt,free_float_shares,update_time,create_time) VALUES
(0,#{otherIndexDO.code}, #{otherIndexDO.codeName}, #{otherIndexDO.rtMktCap}, #{otherIndexDO.totalShares}, #{otherIndexDO.rtFloatMktCap}, #{otherIndexDO.shareIssuingMkt}, #{otherIndexDO.freeFloatShares}, now(), now())
on duplicate key update is_deleted = 0,code=values(code),code_name=values(code_name),rt_mkt_cap=values(rt_mkt_cap), total_shares=values(total_shares),rt_float_mkt_cap=values(rt_float_mkt_cap), share_issuing_mkt=values(share_issuing_mkt),free_float_shares=values(free_float_shares), update_time=now()
